caption: Relating to the provisions required in an interstate compact on border security.
summary: This bill amends Texas Government Code to define "illegal alien" and expand interstate compact provisions for border security. While not specifically targeting Chinese immigrants, it affects any non-US citizens unlawfully present in the US, including Chinese nationals. The bill enables states to share resources, build barriers, conduct surveillance, and enforce federal immigration laws along the Texas-Mexico border through joint actions.
translation: 该法案修改德克萨斯州政府法典，定义了"非法外国人"并扩大了州际边境安全协议条款。虽然没有特别针对中国移民，但该法案影响所有在美国非法居留的非公民，包括中国公民。该法案允许各州共享资源，建造屏障，进行监控，并通过联合行动在德克萨斯-墨西哥边境执行联邦移民法。
